price: 122. Nabiyow muslimiin macaxih Buttak Namma Butta Qeebik Conxitteeh wadir gactam Siinik niyatte waqdi cus; Yalli wohuk ken cateeh usuk ken Awlaytuy ken dacrisa kinnik; Toysa moominiin kulli caalatal Yallal kelittay.
arabic: إِذۡ هَمَّت طَّآئِفَتَانِ مِنكُمۡ أَن تَفۡشَلَا وَٱللَّهُ وَلِيُّهُمَاۗ وَعَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَلۡيَتَوَكَّلِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: idh hammat ṭāifatāni minkum an tafshalā wal-lahu waliyyuhumā waʿalā al-lahi falyatawakkali al-mu'minūna
